front.title: Real-time Application Quality of Service Monitoring (RAQMON) MIB

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. The document proposes an extension to the Remote Monitoring MIB - RFC 2819. In particular, it describes managed objects used for real-time application Quality of Service (QoS) monitoring. Distribution of this memo is unlimited. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
